data.title: History of Timisoara
data.meta_description:
History of Timisoara - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document summarizes the history of Timișoara (Temesvár), Romania in three parts:

1) Archaeological evidence shows the area was inhabited since ancient times by Dacians and later Romans. The medieval fortress is first mentioned in 1177 and was an important political and economic center in the region. 

2) The city was conquered by the Ottomans in 1551 and became an administrative center. It was regained by the Habsburg Empire in 1716 and rebuilt, attracting new settlers from across Europe. 

3) In the 19th century it modernized with new infrastructure like railways and electric lighting. After World War 1 it became part of Romania. In 1989
